readable.title: 2918880895_e61f74f2f0
readable.content: A man in a yellow and yellow shirt puts his arm around a man in a blue shirt . A man in a yellow shirt and a man in a blue shirt and tie posing for a picture . Two employees pose for a picture . Two guys , one black and one white , smiling for the camera . Two men each have one arm around each other and are in formal dresswear
